name: BootcampConquer
description:
The point of the game is to overcome the very challenging bootcamp.

Our game objects are Lectures and CodePractice, that increase the Knowledge. HardCode and Weed that decrease the Motivation (AKA life), Master Coders and Mariana that increase it.

GameOver happens when Motivation is at 0 and for you to win the game, you have to increase your knowledge bar to the max.

ATT: At the moment we only have game objects that move down and a Cadet that moves left and right in the bottom of the canvas attempting to catch or not the game objects.
